## Functions Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678">addIncomingValuesToPHIs</a> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;Successor, MachineBasicBlock &#42;OrigMBB, MachineBasicBlock &#42;NewMBB, MachineRegisterInfo &#42;MRI)</>}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for PHIs that have an incoming value from <code>OrigMBB</code> and will add the same incoming value from <code>NewMBB</code>. <a href="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">computeBranchTargetAndInversion</a> (unsigned CROp, unsigned BROp, bool UsingDef1, bool &amp;InvertNewBranch, bool &amp;InvertOrigBranch, bool &amp;TargetIsFallThrough)</>}>
Given a CR logical operation <code>CROp</code>, branch opcode <code>BROp</code> as well as a flag to indicate if the first operand of <code>CROp</code> is used as the SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original fall-through block. <a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Functions

### addIncomingValuesToPHIs() {#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void addIncomingValuesToPHIs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Successor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NewMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for PHIs that have an incoming value from <code>OrigMBB</code> and will add the same incoming value from <code>NewMBB</code>.

NOTE: This should only be used if <code>NewMBB</code> is an immediate dominator of <code>OrigMBB</code>.

Definition at line <a href="#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### computeBranchTargetAndInversion() {#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void computeBranchTargetAndInversion (unsigned CROp, unsigned BROp, bool UsingDef1, bool &amp; InvertNewBranch, bool &amp; InvertOrigBranch, bool &amp; TargetIsFallThrough)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a CR logical operation <code>CROp</code>, branch opcode <code>BROp</code> as well as a flag to indicate if the first operand of <code>CROp</code> is used as the SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original fall-through block.

Definition at line <a href="#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### splitMBB() {#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool splitMBB (<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo">BlockSplitInfo</a> &amp; BSI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Splits a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> to branch before <code>SplitBefore</code>.

The original branch is <code>OrigBranch</code>. The target of the new branch can either be the same as the target of the original branch or the fallthrough successor of the original block as determined by <code>BranchToFallThrough</code>. The branch conditions will be inverted according to <code>InvertNewBranch</code> and <code>InvertOrigBranch</code>. If an instruction that previously fed the branch is to be deleted, it is provided in <code>MIToDelete</code> and <code>NewCond</code> will be used as the branch condition. The branch probabilities will be set if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo">MachineBranchProbabilityInfo</a> isn&#39;t null.

Definition at line <a href="#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updatePHIs() {#ac47046162deb21d43512581afc16fa7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void updatePHIs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Successor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NewMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for any incoming values in the PHIs that are supposed to be coming from <code>OrigMBB</code> but whose definition is actually in <code>NewMBB</code>.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> such PHIs will be updated to reflect reality.

Definition at line <a href="#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass aims to reduce the number of logical operations on bits in the CR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register. These instructions have a fairly high latency and only a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pipeline at their disposal in modern PPC cores. Furthermore, they have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tendency to occur in fairly small blocks where there&#39;s little opportunity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to hide the latency between the CR logical operation and its user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppc-h">PPC.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcinstrinfo-h">PPCInstrInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctargetmachine-h">PPCTargetMachine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h">llvm/ADT/Statistic.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinebranchprobabilityinfo-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineBranchProbabilityInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinedominators-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineDominators.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunctionPass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Splits a MachineBasicBlock to branch before \\p SplitBefore. The original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// branch is \\p OrigBranch. The target of the new branch can either be the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as the target of the original branch or the fallthrough successor of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// original block as determined by \\p BranchToFallThrough. The branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// conditions will be inverted according to \\p InvertNewBranch and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p InvertOrigBranch. If an instruction that previously fed the branch is to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be deleted, it is provided in \\p MIToDelete and \\p NewCond will be used as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the branch condition. The branch probabilities will be set if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MachineBranchProbabilityInfo isn&#39;t null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3">splitMBB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo">BlockSplitInfo</a> &amp;BSI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#aae359e559a78b42097a79266c811fc3e">allInstrsInSameMBB</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;All instructions must be in the same block.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = &amp;MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;isSSA() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can only do this while the function is in SSA form.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a81626de817a0cb021ff8e915cf1942ed">succ&#95;size</a>() != 2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Don&#39;t know how to handle blocks that don&#39;t have exactly&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; two successors.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcinstrinfo">PPCInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a>&gt;().getInstrInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OrigBROpcode = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a3c6175f3cba584dfe3bbacd95ab5a5bd">OrigBranch</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InvertedOpcode =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OrigBROpcode == PPC::BC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? PPC::BCn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : OrigBROpcode == PPC::BCn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">                ? PPC::BC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">                : OrigBROpcode == PPC::BCLR ? PPC::BCLRn : PPC::BCLR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewBROpcode = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a9de3800c0e12a80f9d768dc85bcf4d03">InvertNewBranch</a> ? InvertedOpcode : OrigBROpcode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a3c6175f3cba584dfe3bbacd95ab5a5bd">OrigBranch</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a57e64b633278df75c699e6b98ce15031">getMBB</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigFallThrough = OrigTarget == &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a6321b189ea8fd5058663f8a87d6c23e9">succ&#95;begin</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           ? &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#abd32ea34faf1cde285a1b8daccd9c167">succ&#95;rbegin</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           : &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a6321b189ea8fd5058663f8a87d6c23e9">succ&#95;begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBRTarget =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#af48aeae6890b3963983bb7b556243a81">BranchToFallThrough</a> ? OrigFallThrough : OrigTarget;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s impossible to know the precise branch probability after the split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But it still needs to be reasonable, the whole probability to original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// targets should not be changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After split NewBRTarget will get two incoming edges. Assume P0 is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original branch probability to NewBRTarget, P1 and P2 are new branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probabilies to NewBRTarget after split. If the two edge frequencies are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      F &#42; P1 = F &#42; P0 / 2            ==&gt;  P1 = P0 / 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      F &#42; (1 - P1) &#42; P2 = F &#42; P1     ==&gt;  P2 = P1 / (1 - P1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ProbToNewTarget, ProbFallThrough;     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prob for new Br.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ProbOrigTarget, ProbOrigFallThrough;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prob for orig Br.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ProbToNewTarget = ProbFallThrough = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a76e4454abb329dee28e8f525ddd1a210">BranchProbability::getUnknown</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ProbOrigTarget = ProbOrigFallThrough = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a76e4454abb329dee28e8f525ddd1a210">BranchProbability::getUnknown</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#af48aeae6890b3963983bb7b556243a81">BranchToFallThrough</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbToNewTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo/#ad78fb9b4721b71aa297bd2bda44e7e39">getEdgeProbability</a>(ThisMBB, OrigFallThrough) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbOrigFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget / ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbOrigTarget = ProbOrigFallThrough.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbToNewTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo/#ad78fb9b4721b71aa297bd2bda44e7e39">getEdgeProbability</a>(ThisMBB, OrigTarget) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a CR logical operation \\p CROp, branch opcode \\p BROp as well as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a flag to indicate if the first operand of \\p CROp is used as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fall-through block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">computeBranchTargetAndInversion</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CROp, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BROp, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsingDef1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;InvertNewBranch, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;InvertOrigBranch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;TargetIsFallThrough) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The conditions under which each of the output operands should be &#91;un&#93;set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can certainly be written much more concisely with just 3 if statements or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ternary expressions. However, this provides a much clearer overview to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reader as to what is set for each &lt;CROp, BROp, OpUsed&gt; combination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BROp == PPC::BC || BROp == PPC::BCLR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Regular branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CROp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Don&#39;t know how to handle this CR logical.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPC::CROR:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Looks through a COPY instruction to the actual definition of the CR-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register and returns the instruction that defines it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FIXME: This currently handles what is by-far the most common case:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an instruction that defines a CR field followed by a single copy of a bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from that field into a virtual register. If chains of copies need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handled, this should have a loop until a non-copy instruction is found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#a24fbb3a26fc0fcefed74db2072222bb5"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#a24fbb3a26fc0fcefed74db2072222bb5">PPCReduceCRLogicals::lookThroughCRCopy</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Reg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Subreg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;CpDef) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Subreg = Copy-&gt;getOperand(1).getSubReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CopySrc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = &amp;TII-&gt;getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the Subreg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopySrc == PPC::CR0EQ || CopySrc == PPC::CR6EQ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subreg = PPC::sub&#95;eq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopySrc == PPC::CR0LT || CopySrc == PPC::CR6LT)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopySrc == PPC::CR0GT || CopySrc == PPC::CR6GT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subreg = PPC::sub&#95;gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopySrc == PPC::CR0UN || CopySrc == PPC::CR6UN)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subreg = PPC::sub&#95;un;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop backwards and return the first MI that modifies the physical CR Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Me = Copy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = Copy-&gt;getParent()-&gt;begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Me != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((--Me)-&gt;modifiesRegister(CopySrc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#42;Me;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MRI-&gt;getVRegDef(CopySrc);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Contains all the implemented transformations on CR logical operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example, a binary CR logical can be used to split a block on its inputs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a unary CR logical might be used to change the condition code on a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// comparison feeding it. A nullary CR logical might simply be removable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if the user of the bit it &#91;un&#93;sets can be transformed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCReduceCRLogicals::handleCROp(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can definitely split a block on the inputs to a binary CR operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whose defs and (single) use are within the same block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CRLogicalOpInfo CRI = AllCRLogicalOps&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CRI.IsBinary &amp;&amp; CRI.ContainedInBlock &amp;&amp; CRI.SingleUse &amp;&amp; CRI.FeedsBR &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.DefsSingleUse) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = splitBlockOnBinaryCROp(CRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumBlocksSplitOnBinaryCROp++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Splits a block that contains a CR-logical operation that feeds a branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and whose operands are produced within the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr5&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr2, 0; CRRC:%vr5 G8RC:%vr2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr6&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr5:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr6 CRRC:%vr5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr7&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr3, 0; CRRC:%vr7 G8RC:%vr3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr8&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr7:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr8 CRRC:%vr7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr9&lt;def&gt; = CROR %vr6&lt;kill&gt;, %vr8&lt;kill&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9,%vr6,%vr8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    BC %vr9&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr5&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr2, 0; CRRC:%vr5 G8RC:%vr2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr6&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr5:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr6 CRRC:%vr5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    BC %vr6&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr7&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr3, 0; CRRC:%vr7 G8RC:%vr3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    %vr8&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr7:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr8 CRRC:%vr7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    BC %vr9&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCReduceCRLogicals::splitBlockOnBinaryCROp(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/crlogicalopinfo">CRLogicalOpInfo</a> &amp;CRI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CRI.CopyDefs.first == CRI.CopyDefs.second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unable to split as the two operands are the same\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumNotSplitIdenticalOperands++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CRI.TrueDefs.first-&gt;isCopy() || CRI.TrueDefs.second-&gt;isCopy() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.TrueDefs.first-&gt;isPHI() || CRI.TrueDefs.second-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unable to split because one of the operands is a PHI or &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;chain of copies.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumNotSplitChainCopies++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: keep in sync with computeBranchTargetAndInversion().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CROR &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRAND &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRNOR &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRNAND &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRORC &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRANDC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unable to split blocks on this opcode.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumNotSplitWrongOpcode++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Splitting the following CR op:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; CRI.dump());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Def1It = CRI.TrueDefs.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Def2It = CRI.TrueDefs.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsingDef1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &#42;SplitBefore = &amp;&#42;Def2It;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = CRI.MI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;end(); Def2It != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++Def2It) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Def1It == Def2It) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def2 comes before Def1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitBefore = &amp;&#42;Def1It;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UsingDef1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We will split the following block:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(CRI.MI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;dump());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Before instruction:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; SplitBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#accc60d2019e9dff57bb0918a94422ebb">dump</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the branch instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid/#ab357441fcd1ea1f9b0d27c12700f6023a359237c780f7c8e40645575826da8a3c">Branch</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MRI-&gt;use&#95;nodbg&#95;begin(CRI.MI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg())-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want the new block to have no code in it other than the definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the input to the CR logical and the CR logical itself. So we move</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// those to the bottom of the block (just before the branch). Then we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will split before the CR logical.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineBasicBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = SplitBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstTerminator = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a7f0521fa2de44271fd4b909ea7351ef3">getFirstTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> FirstInstrToMove =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UsingDef1 ? CRI.TrueDefs.first : CRI.TrueDefs.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> SecondInstrToMove =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UsingDef1 ? CRI.CopyDefs.first : CRI.CopyDefs.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The instructions that need to be moved are not guaranteed to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contiguous. Move them individually.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: If one of the operands is a chain of (single use) copies, they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can all be moved and we can still split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adf0023bdc4f05a7849c35b1c859580d8">splice</a>(FirstTerminator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, FirstInstrToMove);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstInstrToMove != SecondInstrToMove)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adf0023bdc4f05a7849c35b1c859580d8">splice</a>(FirstTerminator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, SecondInstrToMove);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adf0023bdc4f05a7849c35b1c859580d8">splice</a>(FirstTerminator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, CRI.MI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InvertOrigBranch, InvertNewBranch, TargetIsFallThrough;</span></CodeLine>
